title: As a User, I want former players / current employees returned as results in Advanced Search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
AND navigated to Advanced Search
custom_steps:
WHEN performing an advanced search for a professional player

Ex. Don Mattingly
custom_expected:
THEN current employees that are former players should be returned in the search results.
AND these former players will only have one record in the search results
AND clicking on the name will take you to their employee profile

title: Create a proper 404 page
custom_steps: For invalid URLs, the current behavior is that the app loads the Rosters page with blank content.   Since this is not particularly helpful for the user, we should create a view for 404 pages.  We can then tag this page in Omniture as a error page, which may give us insight into broken links/paths.

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want the Drug Testing System (DTS) to Send Information to EBIS through a messaging queue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Drug Testing User is logged in
AND EBIS received data points from DTS

Reqs:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Testing+System+%28DTS%29+to+EBIS
custom_expected:
THEN the messaging queue is set up
AND a listener to process the request is set up
AND the requests in the database are updated

title: As a Club User, I want to add multiple phone numbers to a Drug Test Request form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club

Wire:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to a Drug Test Request form
custom_expected:
THEN Player Contact Info subsection will be renamed to Address
AND District and City fields will be moved to the right of Address
AND Email will be moved into the Player Info section
AND Phone Number fields will be moved into their own "Phone Number(s)" section below Address and Trainer Contact Info
AND There will be an Add Number button in the Phone Number sections
AND This button will add another set of blank phone number fields
AND This will function the same as the Phone Number section on player profiles
AND If 1 phone number block is visible no trashcan will be visible, if 2 blocks are visible 2 trashcans are visible

title: As a BOC User, I want a Drug Test History widget on Player Profiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
AND has one of the following permissions
--ebis-intl-boc-drugtesting-admin-role
--ebis-intl-boc-drugtesting-viewer-role


Wireframe:
https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=contracts

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+History+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to an International Player Profile (both amateur and professional)
AND clicking on the Contracts tab
custom_expected:
THEN a Drug Test History widget will be displayed
AND the widget will follow the provided data discovery

title: As a BOC User, I want Clubs to be required to enter Trainer Names on new Drug Test Request forms
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN Clubs are entering a new Drug Test Request
custom_expected:
THEN Trainer First and Last name will be required
AND If left blank, the on submit required field check will return an error to the user

title: As a Club User, I want an Additional Prospect Info comment box added to Drug Test Request forms
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club

Wireframe: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_request

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: THEN navigating to a Drug Test Request form
custom_expected:
THEN there will a be a new Comments section added to the Drug Test Request Form
AND in this section, there will be an "Additional Prospect Info" comment box
AND these comments will be available in new columns in all 3 Drug Test Request widgets
AND the new columns will be titled "Add. Info"
AND the comments will not be editable through the widget

title: As a user, I would like Player ID to appear on the 2nd batch of ebis reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the Reports widget
custom_steps:
WHEN accessing the following reports
-Player Service Report
-Player Transaction Log
-NES Players 
-Organizational Summary Report
-Roster Detail
-Player Options
custom_expected: THEN player ID will be visible on the reports

title: As a User, I want to indicate that cash considerations over $100,000 is meant to offset salary
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN performing a Trade including cash consideration
custom_expected:
THEN for each cash consideration an "Offset Salary" checkbox is available
AND if the entered cash considerations are less than or equal to $100,000, the checkbox will be disabled
AND if the entered cash considerations are greater that $100,000, the checkbox will become enabled
AND On submit, there will be a check to see if the checkbox is checked when the considerations entered are greater than $100,000
AND If the the check fails for Club Users, they will be given a blocking message
       "Cash considerations in excess of $100,000 may only be included for the purpose of offsetting a player's salary."
AND one button will be available       "Back"
BUT if the check fails for BOC Users, they will be given an Overridable Warning
      "Cash considerations in excess of $100,000 may only be included for the purpose of offsetting a player's salary.
AND two buttons will be available.       "Back"           "Ignore & Continue"

title: As a User, I want to be stopped from submitting a trade if a participating Club does not include at least one player, draft selection, or international slot
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a Club User submits a trade where an involved Club does not include at least one player, draft selection, or international slot
custom_expected:
THEN  a blocking message will fire:
  -- **Body:** Warning: Safe Harbor not applicable. At least one Club is not assigning a player contract, draft selection or international slot.
  -- **Buttons:** Back
BUT if a BOC User submits a trade where an involved Club does not include at least one player, draft selection, or international slot, a blocking message will fire:
  -- **Body:** Warning: Safe Harbor not applicable. At least one Club is not assigning a player contract, draft selection or international slot.
  -- **Buttons:** Ignore & Continue, Back

title: As a User, I want to be warned that my trade may not ultimately be eligible for Safe Harbor if it includes a PTBNL
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a User submits a trade that includes a Player To Be Named Later for any Club
custom_expected:
THEN a warning message will fire:
  **Body:** Warning: This transaction involves a Player to be Named Later. In the event both 
  Clubs subsequently agree to assign a Player to be Named Later whose contract is a Disqualified 
  Player Contract, the Safe Harbor election will be deemed null and void.
  AND Continue and Back buttons will be available
AND this message should fire on both 'Submit to Club' and 'Submit to BOC'

title: As a User, I want to be warned that my trade by not ultimately be eligible for Safe Harbor if I choose to send Cash instead of a PTBNL
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps:
WHEN a User submits a trade that includes a Player To Be Named Later for any Club
AND that is the only consideration that one Club sends
custom_expected:
THEN a warning message will fire:
--*Body*: Warning: This transaction involves a Player to be Named Later. 
--In the event both Clubs subsequently agree to a cash payment in lieu of the 
--Player to be Named Later, or in the event both Clubs subsequently agree to 
--assign a Player to be Named Later whose contract is a Disqualified Player 
--Contract, the Safe Harbor election will be deemed null and void.
AND two buttons will be available "Continue" and "Back"
AND this message should fire on both 'Submit to Club' and 'Submit to BOC'

title: As a User, I want to the Safe Harbor Election flag added to LINK's Outright (Trade) Endpoint
As a User, I want to see a new paragraph added to the Assignment Agreement if a trade has the Safe Harbor Election checkbox checked
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is performing a Trade
custom_steps: WHEN an Outright Trade has the Safe Harbor Election checkbox checked
custom_expected:
THEN the Assignment Agreement will contain the following paragraph:
--Each assignor Club and each assignee Club hereby agree to treat the assignment of 
each of the contracts listed above consistent with Section 4 of Revenue Procedure 2019-18 
issued by the Internal Revenue Service on April 11, 2019 to the extent each such Club is 
subject to Federal income tax in the United States.â€￾
AND the paragraph will appear immediately after the paragraph that begins with "Each assignor club shall remain liable..." 
BUT if the Safe Harbor box is not checked, the new language will not be included in the Assignment Agreement

title: As a BOC User, I want the system to automatically remove a player from the Disqualified Player widget if he changed Orgs since being added to the widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wireframe: https://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=disqualified_players

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Disqualified+Players
custom_steps: WHEN a transaction occurs that cause a player's current Org to be different from the Org he was with when he was added to the widget
custom_expected:
THEN the system will remove the player from the widget
AND the system will generate a clipboard notification for BOC users notifying them that the player has been removed from the Disqualified Player widget
AND the system will track the 'deleted timestamp' for tracking purposes
AND the column that was added to display the warning should be removed, as players will be automatically removed

title: Disqualified Player Widget PERMISSIONS
custom_steps:
**New LDAP Group:**
ebis-widget-disqualifiedplayers

**Role Assignments:**

**BOC:**
- ebis-mj-trans-boc-super-admin-role
- ebis-mj-trans-boc-admin-role 
- ebis-mj-trans-boc-viewer-role

**Clubs:**
 - ebis-mj-trans-club-admin-role
 - ebis-mj-trans-club-viewer-role

Only BOC Users will be allowed to edit this widget

title: As a BOC User, I want to delete a player from the Disqualified Player Widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Disqualified+Players
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Disqualified Players widget
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a trashcan icon on all rows in the Disqualified Players widget
AND clicking the icon will prompt the user to confirm they want to delete the chosen row
AND if the user confirms, the modal will be dismissed and the row will be removed from the widget
AND if the user cancels, the modal will be dismissed and the widget will remain unchanged

title: As a User, I want to view a Disqualified Player flag on the Pro Player Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
AND has permission to view the Disqualified Players widget

Wireframe: https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Info+Tab+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Baseball Info section of the Pro Player Profile
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a "Disqualified Player" field
AND if the player doesn't appear in the Disqualified Player widget, this flag will be set to No 
AND if the player appears in the Disqualified Player widget, this flag will be set to Yes
AND if the player is removed from the Disqualified Player widget, this flag will be reset to No

title: As a User, I want to the Disqualified Player flag added to LINK's Person Endpoint
As a User, I want to be stopped from submitting a trade if it includes a Disqualified Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a Club/BOC User submits a trade that includes a player on the Disqualified Player widget and the Safe Harbor Election box is checked
custom_expected:
THEN a blocking message will fire:
  -- **Body:** Warning: Safe Harbor cannot be elected. Transaction includes one or more Disqualified Player Contracts. 
  -- **Buttons:** Back
BUT if BOC submits the trade there will also be an "Ignore & Continue" button available
